properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_ENG_NAME , USER_PWD , BIRTH_DATE , EMAIL , PHONE , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ETC , REGIST_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , REGIST_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , AUTHENTICODE , HOTEL_NAME FROM TB_MEM WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_PWD , ADMIN_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , STATUS FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = ? AND ADMIN_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_ENG_NAME , USER_PWD , BIRTH_DATE , EMAIL , PHONE , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ETC ) VALUES ( SEQ_USERNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE EMAIL = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEM WHERE HOTEL_NAME = ? AND AUTHENTICODE = ?
UPDATE TB_MEM SET MEM_ID = ? , MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_PHONE = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? WHERE HOTEL_NAME = ? AND AUTHENTICODE = ?
SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND PHONE = ?
UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_MEM SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_ADMIN SET ADMIN_PWD = ? WHERE ADMIN_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND PHONE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEM WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PHONE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = ? AND PHONE = ?
SELECT HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_NO , COUNT(*) RES_COUNT , IMG_PATH FROM TB_RES_INFO JOIN TB_HOTEL USING (HOTEL_NO) GROUP BY HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_NO, IMG_PATH ORDER BY RES_COUNT DESC
